method.name: PUT
method.doc: To update a network certificate database with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the SSL Certificates resource URI. This request is only valid for network certificate databases.

param.name: Authorization
param.doc: Basic Authentication header

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: token_label
param.doc: The token label of the certificate database.

param.name: passcode
param.doc: The passcode of the certificate database.

param.name: ip
param.doc: The IP address of the module.

param.name: port
param.doc: The port of the module. Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases.

param.name: kneti_hash
param.doc: The hash of the KNETI key. Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases.

param.name: esn
param.doc: The Electronic Serial Number (ESN) of the module. Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases.

param.name: secondary_ip
param.doc: The IP address of the secondary module. Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases.

param.name: secondary_port
param.doc: The port of the secondary module. Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases.

param.name: secondary_kneti_hash
param.doc: The hash of the secondary's KNETI key. Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases.

param.name: secondary_esn
param.doc: The Electronic Serial Number (ESN) of the secondary module. Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases.

param.name: use_rfs
param.doc: A flag indicating if an RFS will be used. Default is true. Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases.

param.name: rfs
param.doc: The IP address of the Remote File System (RFS). Required if use_rfs is "true".

param.name: rfs_port
param.doc: The port of the Remote File System (RFS). Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases.

param.name: rfs_auth
param.doc: Specifies whether KNETI authentication is used when connecting to the RFS. Only valid for Thales nShield Connect certificate databases. Valid values are "on" or "off".

param.name: update_zip
param.doc: A zip file containing local data to be uploaded from the device. Only valid if use_rfs is "false".

param.name: safenet_pw
param.doc: The password of the SafeNet device admin account. Only valid for SafeNet Luna SA certficiate databases.

param.name: update_cert
param.doc: A flag indicating that the certificate for this client on the Luna SA device should be recreated. The client on the device should be recreated with the new certificate. Required if the IP address of the device has been modified. Only valid for SafeNet Luna SA certficiate databases.
